info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 4 at 5:55AM CDT until April 4 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
FFWPAH
The National Weather Service in Paducah has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Fulton County in western Kentucky... Central Graves County in western Kentucky... Hickman County in western Kentucky... Southeastern Livingston County in western Kentucky... Lyon County in western Kentucky... Marshall County in western Kentucky...
* Until 1015 AM CDT.
* At 555 AM CDT, emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain, causing significant street flooding on Mayfield Sth 9th. Between 4 and 8 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mayfield, Benton, Calvert City, Eddyville, Fulton, Hickman, Clinton, Hillman Ferry Campground, Birmingham Ferry Recreation Area, Demumbers Bay Campground, Land Between The Lakes Area, Cravens Bay Campground, Fulgham, Cayce, Kuttawa, Wingo, Hardin, Grand Rivers, Water Valley and Brewers.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 10:15 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 10:15 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Fulton, KY; Graves, KY; Hickman, KY; Livingston, KY; Lyon, KY; Marshall, KY

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 10:15 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 10:15 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Fulton, KY; Graves, KY; Hickman, KY; Livingston, KY; Lyon, KY; Marshall, KY
